response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits that cater to your specific needs. Given its intrinsic worth and the quality it represents, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a special price of $750,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while allowing us to maintain a mutually beneficial relationship. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can significantly enhance your experience.", "product_price": 750000}
